hotspot.title: New Cafe
hotspot.description:
New Cafe for the general public. Also provides space for Pod and Bridge staff operations.
On site operative would be stationed here whenever the service is running, monitoring camera feeds from within each pod to ensure passenger safety.

hotspot.title: pod passing place
hotspot.description: pods can pass here

hotspot.description: Zebra pedestrian crossing

hotspot.title: Pedestrian Crossing
hotspot.description: Zebra pedestrian crossing

hotspot.title: Cycle Lane
hotspot.description: Cycle lane for onwards travel to Hammersmith Broadway via Bridge View and Bridge Avenue

hotspot.title: Loading Bay
hotspot.description: loading bay for nearby businesses

hotspot.title: Improved Public Realm
hotspot.description: New public space with planting areas, additional seating and widened pavements.

hotspot.title: Passing Place
hotspot.description:
Pods to wait here for oncoming pods to pass. Only one pod permitted on the bridge at any one time.
Inductive charging embedded in the road enables pods to charge while waiting to cross the bridge.

hotspot.title: Pedestrian Crossing
hotspot.description: Zebra pedestrian crossing

hotspot.title: Pod Stop
hotspot.description: Pod stop to improve access to North riverside

hotspot.title: Cycle Lane
hotspot.description: Bi-directional cycle lane.

hotspot.title: Improved Public Realm
hotspot.description:
Planting provided along the length of the bridge.
Hydroponic growth substrate and automatic irrigation will be used to minimise additional weight on the bridge. Planting can be concentrated on top of the stone pillars if needed.

hotspot.title: Road space
hotspot.description: Existing segregated walkways retained

hotspot.title: Pedestrian Crossing
hotspot.description: Zebra pedestrian crossing

hotspot.title: Passing Place
hotspot.description:
Pods to wait here for oncoming pods to pass. Only one pod permitted on the bridge at any one time.

hotspot.title: Taxi Rank
hotspot.description: Space for approximately two taxis. May also be used as a loading bay.

hotspot.title: Improved Public Realm
hotspot.description: Segregated Podway with planting.

hotspot.title: Cycle Hire
hotspot.description: Space for potential cycle hire parking.

hotspot.title: Road Space
hotspot.description:
Access to Riverview Gardens, Clavering Avenue and Arundel Terrace via Castelnau retained.
Low vehicular movement enables shared road space with cyclist.

hotspot.title: Scooter Hire Parking
hotspot.description: Podway crossing for cycles and scooters for access to Glentham Road and existing scooter hire parking spaces.

hotspot.title: Barnes Terminus
hotspot.description:
Interchange with local southbound buses. Additional seating and a green plant roof.
Weight limiters on board the pods will prevent shuttles from departing from stops if they are overloaded.

hotspot.title: Traffic Lights
hotspot.description: Advance stop line for cyclists with low cyclist traffic lights.

hotspot.title: Bus Gate
hotspot.description: Controlled junction with bus gate. Bus gate will activate on the approach of a bus to give priority to the junction. The junction is wide enough for terminating buses to do a U -turn.

hotspot.title: Cycle Lanes
hotspot.description: New protected cycle lanes on Lonsdale Road

hotspot.title: Mobility Scooter Hire
hotspot.description: Potential for UK first public mobility scooter hire

hotspot.description: Cycle parking expanded

hotspot.description: Emergency vehicle access retained

hotspot.title: Bus stops

hotspot.title: Accessibility
hotspot.description: All pods will be fully accessible with either level boarding or manual ramps at all stops. Capacity of pods will be up to 10 passengers or 7 including a wheelchair user
